= How to =

To join the Cities XL Mods site and be able to post new downloads you must first do the following items

 # create a Google account if you do not have one you can [https://www.google.com/accounts/NewAccount?continue=http://code.google.com/p/citiesxlmods/&followup=http://code.google.com/p/citiesxlmods/&service=code&ltmpl=phosting create one here]
 # from your Google account send a email to *citiesxlrequests@preytontech.net* with the subject of *Request to Join citiesxlmods* all google.com account have a [gmail.com gmail.com] email address

<br>
Once the email is received you will have access to create new downloads within 24 hours
